quotes.quote: What you are is the most subtle delicacy of being.
This is a subtle truth. Whatever you love, you are.
The subtlest beauties in our life are unseen and unheard.
The subtlest of subtleties, this is the gateway to all mysteries.
Train yourself to be in awe of the subtle, and you will live in a world of beauty and ease.
The most subtle of our acts is to simulate blindness for snares that we know are set for us.
In very subtle ways, how we regard ourselves and others continually changes us into something new.
Subtle impressions for which words are quite too coarse a medium
The subtle are the causes, the gross the effects.
The subtle dance of the body joins us to the world.
For the subtlest folly proceeds from the subtlest wisdom.
The subtler one's awareness, the more powerfully it can heal.
So subtle is the atmosphere of opinion that it will make itself felt without words.
Without subtle ingenuity of mind, one cannot make certain of the truth of their reports.
It is always safe to assume that people are more subtle and less sensitive than they seem.
When values are contrasting, use subtle color. When values are subtle, use contrasting color.
The more subtle and elegant you are in hiding your plot points, the better you are as a writer.
But nature is always more subtle, more intricate, more elegant than what we are able to imagine.
Nature is subtle and complex.
Time is the subtle thief of youth.
Love is the subtlest force in the world.
Affected simplicity is a subtle imposture.
Resistance is the subtlest form of attachment.
Love is the most subtle form of self-interest.
A very subtle difference can make the picture or not.
Faith is the subtle chain which binds us to the infinite; the voice of a deep life within, that will remain until we crowd it thence.
The lies we tell ourselves are the most subtle of all lies.
Fear is the most subtle and destructive of all human diseases. Fear kills dreams!
Art is the concrete representation of our most subtle feelings.
The more refined and subtle our minds, the more vulnerable they are.
